titles.title: Sexual Harassment Tax Equity Act of 1996
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a deduction for legal expenses of individuals who bring sexual harassment suits against their employers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/23/1996--Introduced. Sexual Harassment Tax Equity Act of 1996 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for legal expenses of an individual who brings a sexual harassment suit against an employer or former employer. Allows the deduction whether or not the taxpayer itemizes.
